html:
12.7.18  3:12 am   what are the top three ways to get good at something?

      1. do it, 2. see it being done, 3. hear rumours about it being done

12.7.18  2:55 am   im president of the united states and its cool and all but im a perfectionist so sometimes i get caught up on all my little flaws. what do u do to get past ur flaws and get work done?

     i have learned to enjoy making flawed work. sometimes i try to see how big i can make the flaws, and give myself a prize for biggest flaw

12.7.18  2:16 am   would you argue that a real human is asking this question,

     yes

      also do you ever get the feeling you are not in fact that but a d*rn fake?

     no

12.7.18  1:35 am   Play chess much?

     no but i am reasonably familiar with it

12.7.18  1:04 am   Were you always awkward

     most of the known universe is awkward

12.7.18  1:04 am   My sister is going to college soon, but she doesn't know what to major in. Any suggestions?

     unfortunately i don't know what any of the majors are

12.7.18  12:56 am   is th big project concept at all similar to the "artifacts" page concept? 

     no

12.7.18  12:53 am   Best instrument?

     gravity

12.7.18  12:37 am   just a bit of advice, i know that you work as much as possible and that might end up in you accidentally taking a break you didn't wanna take. try to plan your breaks beforehand so they're more in your control and also you might get more things done

     but, what i don't know is, how long are they supposed to be and how often are they supposed to be

12.7.18  12:01 am   a like the new short video! feels like classic Bill. what sparked the break from the every-other-Tuesday-full-song schedule? or is that still going on?

     i was attempting to add non-song videos to the opposite tuesday. but i failed spectacularly, and neither of them was completed in time. so i uploaded the spelling video as a meek token of apologetic embarassment and humiliation

12.6.18  11:49 pm   Wanna make something about trump ?

     there was already way too much about trump, even before he became president of the united states, and now it seems that upwards of 78% of all matter and energy in the universe is about trump

12.6.18  10:59 pm   what percentage of your lyrics actually have a deeper meaning behind them?

     deeper than what

      what percentage of your lyrics are just there because they flow nicely? (ballpark figure)
Obvi there is overlapping between the two, but i am wondering if people overly read into your lyrics the same way that people sometimes overly read into "catcher in the rye" for instance. 

     i'm not sure but i hope they are listening while they read

12.6.18  10:49 pm   what would you recommend

     changing, staying the same, and changing between changing and staying the same

12.6.18  10:30 pm   Are you still coming out with a new song for this upcoming Tuesday?

     unfortunately that is now impossible

12.6.18  9:31 pm   I liked today's video. Are you planning to do more like that "random" style or are you just gonna stick to doing songs?

     i would like to do both

12.6.18  9:25 pm   Why are some of your song titles capitalized but most aren't?

     i'm not sure

12.6.18  8:22 pm   12.5.18  10:43 am when you transcribed did you usually write down whatever you were transcribing on paper first before learning it at speed, or the other way around?

     different things. i transcribed a lot of chords when i was young

12.6.18  8:17 pm   whats your least favorite question

     the ones that try to get me to dislike something

12.6.18  8:15 pm   do you like eminem's lose yourself

     i strongly prefer 8 mile, the song

12.6.18  7:43 pm   Is tonality just a Western construct?

     no

      Then again, isn't atonality also a Western construct?

     it shouldn't be but i think they think it is

12.6.18  7:31 pm   Are you going to make more Monday videos?

     no but i was thinking of making more tuesday videos

12.6.18  7:00 pm   What is a good gift to give?

     cuddles

12.6.18  6:59 pm   How do you handle hate

     with smoke and mirrors

12.6.18  6:49 pm   What do you think the future will be like?

     a little more complicated

12.6.18  6:46 pm   would you ever do a collaboration (this is not a collaboration request, just curious)

     i would like to but i have no idea how that would work

12.6.18  6:42 pm   how long have you been self-aware

     about 2 minutes

12.6.18  6:34 pm   what layer of irony are you on right now

     i found a slanted layer which travels between the layers

12.6.18  6:31 pm   do you believe in magic?

     yes

12.6.18  6:16 pm   wow, ok. there's one part of this how to win at spelling video that absolutely blows me away. it's the anagram. "the complete good spelling kit" into "dog pilot gets pickle on helmet". normally i would be like "oh cool an anagram" but then i realized you used the pickle dog asset in an earlier video. so that raises several questions
1) was this video in planning much longer than expected

     no

      2) if not which  half of the anagram was made first?

     spelling

      did you start from the dog pilot one and make the spelling one, thus creating the idea for the video?

     no

      3) did you create the idea for a spelling video and then somehow find a way on purpose to create a phrase that anagrams to relate to the dog pickle helmet thing

     originally there was no helmet. just a dog in a plane. then when making the anagram, i found 'dog pilot' and continued with that, and found pickle and then went back and added the pickle

      many possibilities basically wtf happened this is so great

12.6.18  6:15 pm   will your next 'history' be more or less specific than the entire world?

     i have no idea

     also, you've said a few times you never wanted to touch history again after HOTWIG; what made you change your mind?

     what made you think i changed my mind

12.6.18  6:15 pm   If 5 was 6 would it be 7?

     i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

12.6.18  6:14 pm   woah, are you gonna try to drop 'anything' videos at random times along with the 2 week schedule?

     no, it should hopefully be on the middle tuesday

      how do you gauge when you have time to work on the 'anything' as opposed to a music video?

     better than i did this time i hope

12.6.18  5:39 pm   When I need to focus at work, I listen to your music.
What music do you listen to when you want to focus?

     most of my work has music in it, so it would be detrimental to listen to other music while working on it

12.6.18  5:36 pm   What is your favorite salad?

     beef

12.6.18  5:29 pm   why are millennials killing everyone and everything?

     to make way for new life

12.6.18  5:19 pm   Thank you for making a jingle. How does making videos feel??

     very peculiar

12.6.18  5:12 pm   How long did it take you to fully organize all of your songwriting for it to later be recorded?

     i spent many months doing it in 2012-13 while also continuing writing on it, but after 2013 i stopped and started recording and made a website and also started making videos too

12.6.18  5:06 pm   I create art sometimes, but every time I do it's frustrating to see all these flaws and ways it needs to be improved. How do you get past that feeling with your own work? 

     i hvae a bull dozer

12.6.18  5:02 pm   You mentioned this briefly in the podcast, but what are your thoughts on progress throughout history?

     wild and crazy

12.6.18  5:00 pm   do you plan on doing anything videos along with the songs from now on / on a schedule?

     yes

      or was this a one-off? 

     i tried to add non-song videos to the schedule and as a result i fucked up both. the spelling video is a drop of sugar to try to sweeten up the wound

12.6.18  4:59 pm   woah are you gonna start streaming??

     yes

12.6.18  4:45 pm   was this video planned for 12/4?

     no

      will it affect the 2 week schedule?

     no, but unfortunately the 2 week schedule has already been affected, and that video is a sad offering of apology and remorse

12.6.18  4:41 pm   how much fun can spelling be?

     very, extremely

12.6.18  4:39 pm   Which drumstick grip do you prefer: matching grip or traditional grip?

     traditional

12.6.18  4:01 pm   Are you mt st helens, currently blowing up by producing content faster than anyone thought was possible? 

     yes, although i recently tripped over a small shoelace. it was actually a fake shoelace but i still tripped

12.6.18  3:17 pm   So if you automatically add sleigh bells to a song and say "christmas" does that suddenly make a shitty love song a Christmas classic?

     it might make it a christmas song, but in order to be classic it needs to be very well liked by very many people, for many years

12.6.18  3:06 pm   How do you feel about Christmas?

     pretty good

12.6.18  2:59 pm   picture this, i'm just coming up with a melody and recording it. then i forget about it for half a year and then i look thru my recordings and wow this is a lot of ideas for songs! so i go to my keyboard to find the chords but no matter what i do i always end up with the same damn chord only that the bass note is sinking. how do i get more creative with my chords?

     i would start by making sure you know what chords are in all your favorite songs ..... i'm assuming some of your favorite songs are what you would consider to be 'creative?' so at least learn what those ones are ..... then after you put it all together i think you will start getting frisky one day and come up with something entirely new

12.6.18  2:59 pm   do you enjoy doing what you do?

     yes

      i hope so but it doesn't always seem like it.

     it can be crazy sometimes, but if it wasn't i would get very bored

      mind you, i really enjoy what you do

12.6.18  2:59 pm   I don't really listen to music, but I want to, I just don't know what. How can i figure out what kind of music I like?

     you'll have to just start listening to various music and see if you like it
